amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to create or maintain any patient record-keeping system other than those currently approved by the Department of Veterans Affairs Central Office in Washington DC.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to create or maintain any patient record-keeping system other than those currently approved by the Department of Veterans Affairs Central Office in Washington DC.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
